tool_description: Bitcoin, made simple.  Coinbase is an international digital wallet that allows you to securely buy, use and accept bitcoin currency
name: Coinbase
title: Coinbase

api_list.name: Get bitcoin receive address
api_list.description: Get the user's current bitcoin receive address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-coinbase.p.rapidapi.com/account/receive_address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-coinbase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send invoice request to address
api_list.description: Send an invoice/money request to an email address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-coinbase.p.rapidapi.com/transactions/request_money"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-coinbase.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
